books.title: A Containerized WAF to Secure Apps and APIs - NGINX
books.description: Version 5.0 of NGINX App Protect WAF is designed for public cloud, private cloud, and on-premises deployments in a containerized form factor, which reduces the attack surface.
books.author: Meghan Williams

books.title: Insights from the 2024 NGINX Cookbook: 4 Solutions to Today’s Top Application Delivery Problems - NGINX
books.description: The 2024 NGINX Cookbook tackles modern app delivery challenges, with over 100 recipes for installing, configuring, securing, and scaling NGINX.
books.author: Meghan Williams

books.title: F5 NGINX Ingress Controller with Prometheus-operator for Out-of-the-Box Metrics - NGINX
books.description: NGINX Ingress Controller with Prometheus-operator ServiceMonitor CRD makes gathering metrics on deployments much easier and much faster using helm.
books.author: Meghan Williams

books.title: Announcing NGINX Gateway Fabric Release 1.2.0 - NGINX
books.description: Explore NGINX Gateway Fabric 1.2.0, now with enhanced security, URL rewriting, NGINX Plus support, and telemetry insights for optimal Kubernetes performance.
books.author: Meghan Williams

books.title: Our Design Vision for NGINX One: The Ultimate Data Plane SaaS - NGINX
books.description: NGINX One takes the core NGINX data plane software you're familiar with and enhances it with SaaS-based tools for observability, management, and security.
books.author: Meghan Williams

books.title: The Ingress Controller: Touchstone for Securing AI/ML Apps in Kubernetes - NGINX
books.description: Explore strategic advantages of securing AI/ML applications at the Ingress Controller layer in a Kubernetes environment.
books.author: Meghan Williams

books.title: Scale, Secure, and Monitor AI/ML Workloads in Kubernetes with Ingress Controllers - NGINX
books.description: Learn how to simplify and streamline model serving, experimentation, monitoring, and security for AI/ML workloads using Ingress controllers and F5 NGINX Connectivity Stack for Kubernetes.
books.author: Meghan Williams

books.title: Dynamic A/B Kubernetes Multi-Cluster Load Balancing and Security Controls with NGINX Plus - NGINX
books.description: NGINX Plus enables you to easily automate load balancing traffic to multiple Kubernetes active-active clusters. The NGINX Plus Split Clients module, key-value store, rate limits, and other security controls add enterprise-class traffic management controls to Kubernetes platform and DevOps engineers, providing real-time dynamic ratio load balancing for your Kubernetes apps and services.
books.author: Meghan Williams

books.title: Updating NGINX for the Vulnerabilities in the HTTP/3 Module - NGINX
books.author: Meghan Williams

books.title: NGINX’s Continued Commitment to Securing Users in Action - NGINX
books.description: Learn how NGINX helps improve your security posture, even for experimental features, and why we decided to announce two recent CVEs.
books.author: Meghan Williams

books.title: Meetup Recap: NGINX’s Commitments to the Open Source Community - NGINX
books.description: At the NGINX meetup in San Jose, we reaffirmed our dedication to being an open source standard. To reach this goal, we’re making a set of commitments that positively impact our community.
books.author: Meghan Williams

books.title: NGINX One: A SaaS Solution for Modern Application Management and Delivery - NGINX
books.description: NGINX One will soon be available “as-a-service,” with a single license and a unified management console for enterprise-wide security, availability, observability, and scalability.
books.author: Meghan Williams

books.title: Building the Next NGINX Experience, Designed for the Reality of Modern Apps - NGINX
books.description: A brief look at what we’ve learned from our customers about their application delivery needs, and how it’s shaping our product portfolio.
books.author: Meghan Williams

books.title: Tutorial: Configure OpenTelemetry for Your Applications Using NGINX - NGINX
books.description: Use OpenTelemetry to achieve better visibility into the status and health of your NGINX servers so you can troubleshoot issues and improve web application performance.
books.author: Meghan Williams

books.title: A Quick Guide to Scaling AI/ML Workloads on Kubernetes - NGINX
books.description: Discover how to efficiently scale AI/ML models on Kubernetes and achieve high-performance adaptability across hybrid, multi-cloud environments.
books.author: Meghan Williams

books.title: Join F5 NGINX at AppWorld 2024 - NGINX
books.description: Learn about the many reasons to attend F5’s flagship event, which will include an exciting announcement about the NGINX product portfolio.
books.author: Meghan Williams

books.title: Announcing NGINX Plus R31 - NGINX
books.description: NGINX Plus R31 introduces native support for NGINX usage reporting, QUIC+HTTP/3 improvements and optimizations, a new directive in NGINX JavaScript to run content at periodic intervals, bug fixes, and much more.
books.author: Meghan Williams

books.title: Managing Your NGINX Configurations with GitHub - NGINX
books.description: Learn how to manage versioning, rollback, and workflow of NGINX configurations using Instance Manager’s new integration with Git.
books.author: Meghan Williams

books.title: Watch: NGINX Gateway Fabric at KubeCon North America 2023 - NGINX
books.description: This video stops by the NGINX booth at KubeCon, where we unveiled our implementation of the Kubernetes Gateway API.
books.author: Meghan Williams

books.title: Announcing NGINX Gateway Fabric Version 1.0 - NGINX
books.description: Learn about the first major release of NGINX Gateway Fabric, our Kubernetes Gateway API implementation built on the NGINX data plane, and how it enables extensibility, reduces complexity, and more.
books.author: Danielle Jones

books.title: Which NGINX Ingress Controllers Are Impacted by CVE-2022-4886, CVE-2023-5043, and CVE-2023-5044? - NGINX
books.description: When new CVEs are reported, it’s easy to become confused by their applicability to a particular NGINX Ingress controller tool because there are multiple projects out there. This blog discusses the CVEs and how to distinguish between different Ingress controller projects to clear the confusion.
books.author: Danielle Jones

books.title: How NGINX Gateway Fabric Implements Complex Routing Rules - NGINX
books.description: Learn why we use NGINX JavaScript in our Kubernetes Gateway API implementation for HTTP request matching to solve challenges when routing rules become too complex for Go templates.
books.author: Danielle Jones

books.title: Configure NGINX Plus for SAML SSO with Microsoft Entra ID - NGINX
books.description: Learn how to configure NGINX Plus with Microsoft Entra ID to implement SAML single sign-on for your web applications.
books.author: Danielle Jones

books.title: Why We Decided to Start Fresh with Our NGINX Gateway Fabric - NGINX
books.description: The Gateway API is an evolution of the Ingress resource that reimagines how connectivity is handled in Kubernetes. We discuss why we chose creating a new implementation, NGINX Gateway Fabric, rather than adding Gateway API specifications to NGINX Ingress Controller.
books.author: Danielle Jones

books.title: 5 Reasons to Try the Kubernetes Gateway API - NGINX
books.description: The Gateway API provides a better alternative to the Kubernetes Ingress resource. We discuss reasons to try it and introduce NGINX Gateway Fabric, an open source tool that enables you to use the Gateway API with NGINX as a data plane.
books.author: Danielle Jones

books.title: Improve Azure App Performance and Security with NGINX - NGINX
books.description: Discover the latest performance and security features added to NGINXaaS for Azure, a fully managed service powered by NGINX Plus. New capabilities include directives to secure upstream traffic with TLS, certificate rotation, HTTP/2 support, and more.
books.author: Danielle Jones

books.title: Extending NGINX with Rust (an Alternative to C) - NGINX
books.description: The popular programming language Rust can now be used to build and customize NGINX modules. Learn how to get started building Rust modules for NGINX.
books.author: Danielle Jones

books.title: HTTP/2 Rapid Reset Attack Impacting F5 NGINX Products - NGINX
books.description: Update your NGINX configuration to mitigate a possible denial-of-service attack implemented on the server-side portion of the HTTP/2 specification.
books.author: Danielle Jones

books.title: SSL/TLS Certificate Rotation Without Restarts in NGINX Open Source - NGINX
books.description: The shared dictionary function enables you set up NGINX without the need to restart when rotating SSL/TLS certificates.
books.author: Danielle Jones

books.title: QUIC+HTTP/3 Support for OpenSSL with NGINX - NGINX
books.description: We discuss how NGINX’s OpenSSL Compatibility Layer circumvents challenges with QUIC TLS interfaces that are not currently supported by OpenSSL.
books.author: Danielle Jones

experts.bio: Mike is a math teacher at a local middle school. He has been teaching for 20 years and has a passion for helping students learn how to solve problems.

experts.bio: Emily is a science teacher at a local elementary school. She has been teaching for 5 years and has a passion for helping students learn about the world around them.
